title: parAmukhamEnammA
sahitya:
parAmukhamEnammA pArvatiyammA


anupallavi

  parAtpari parama pAvani bhavAni amba pAril nAn unnaiyE nambinEn


caraNam 1    akhilamengum nirainda jyOtiyE ambikaiyE annaiyE ini nAn tALEnanac-connEn
    caraNam 2    unadu pAdaminri vEru tuNaiyuNDO undan manamirangavum nAn shollavO
    caraNam 3    shyAmakrSNa sOdarI krpAkarI sharaNam sharaNam enru shonnEn tAyE
